body: Commits: - c676346: fix subpath detection - 3b47d1e: fix typo in comment

Commits: - 98d79a9: Fix type any type propagation with patcher relationship - e213a66: Fix context patcher (#526) - 523a091: Fix race cond in variabels (#523) * Add race cond test * Move variables array to vm * Resize vars array for different programs
Commits: - f383e06: Fix panic in checker - 87e38b1: Fix panic in checker - 39c9df6: Fix panic in checker - 931dbf3: Fix date test

Commits: - 0469345: Fix release.yml - 33f2564: Fix release.yml - a406596: Fix release.yml - b0045d0: Fix release.yml - a01be39: Fix release.yml - 918ba6b: Fix release.yml - 710cf58: Fix release.yml - 8386ba7: Fix release.yml

body: Issues: - #180: Add double dots in url. - #7: Try to type assetic. - #343: Dependency Injection - #344: Event Dispatcher - #354: Lock and unlock releases - #345: Default stage selector - #347: Immutable settings - #349: Task grouping for parallel execution - #348: Native SSH support - #44: Integrate checks from publish-please - #11: Got error: dlopen(priv/yomel.so, 2): image not found - #20: No parallel execution? - #371: Empty loops - #1: Add Russian language support - #180: DOM template engine with "updaters". - #133: nodeValue in toString - #1411: How to write transform with support for source maps? - #33: Fail toComment with included content. - #16: Add Monkberry - #1258: How to override fosub_bridge service? - #69: Add deployer - #1487: Add ['override' => true] option in task - #1441: New stage() func proposal - #16: Display long array one item per line - #2544: Badge request: Snapcraft - #208: What about merging recipes and deployer? - #1610: Add support for + in --roles option - #5: What about vendoring symfony into deployer? - #1797: Deployer release policy - #1772: [Proposal] Copy-Paste recipes during init stage - #2356: Migrate to expr - #102: Long line with line number become invisible - #196: Config option to overflow long numbers - #569: Set verbose=false as default - #550: Separate $ into zx-core

desc: I closed an issue that was open for 2 years
body: Issues: - #74: No documentation! - #1336: Increase code coverage up to 80% - #1238: Deployer Vault - #1302: Implement atomic symlink for BSD systems - #1346: Dynamic Inventory - #1384: Deprecate stage in favour of roles - #1385: Check for opcache.enable_cli and apc.enable_cli - #1397: Rsync and recursive directories creation - #1399: Combine drupal7 and drupal8 recipes - #1401: Combine symfony and symfony3 recipes - #1459: Proposal: parameter description. - #1460: Proposal: parameter validator - #1498: Notify about tailing slash on shared_dirs - #1549: default_stage/default_roles - #1566: Add var/sessions to shared for symfony 4 recipe. - #1414: Create a new bin/pull-request script - #1438: New proposal for recipes loading - #1514: Rename runLocally to run_locally? - #1516: [Proposal] Rely on bash instead of POSIX shell in common recipe - #1494: Separate deploy task from framework recipe - #369: Better input for blessed - #20: Bug with fullUnicode: true - #173: Add orgs stats for owners - #52: jsize ky - #37: Using bash autocomplete _filedir - #119: Argument auto-splitting

desc: I closed an issue that was open for 3 years

I found the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe, and everything!

body:
My favorite commit message words are:

1. update (used 730 times)
2. add (used 683 times)
3. readme.md (used 355 times)
4. fix (used 275 times)
5. to (used 248 times)

I use words like "thanks" and "please" in my issues: - #1168: Cheatsheet request: fx - #2969: Detect Motd and warn users about it - #75: With termenv.Ascii color profile, lipgloss prints `\e[1;m` - #81: New API: fast colors - #771: Consider adding fx And many more...

desc: I used only emojis in my commit message.
I closed an issue that was open for 5 years
